roleset.name: move the body in a choreographed or improvised set of rythmic movements
roleset.note: DANCE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls waltz-51.5, performance-26.7-1-1. (from dance.01-v)
DANCE-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to dance.01-v. Vn class waltz-51.5 and performance-26.7-1-1. Framed by Katie. (from dance.01-n)
DANCING-N NOTES: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to dance.01-v and dance.01-n. Dance.01-v is a member of VN classes waltz-51.5 andperformance-26.7-1-1. Framed by Katie. (from dancing.01-n)

example.name: dance-v: intransitive
example.text: One-1 had best *trace*-1 not dance on top of a coffin until the lid is sealed tightly shut.''
example.arg: until the lid is sealed tightly shut

example.name: dance-v: with partner
example.text: The Camden County congressman still carries himself with a trademark ``I'm-coming-down-your-throat'' intensity, but at a pause in Newark's Columbus Day parade recently, he was dancing with his wife in the middle of the avenue in the city's old Italian-American ward.
example.arg: at a pause in Newark's Columbus Day parade
in the middle of the avenue
in the city's old Italian-American ward

example.name: dance-v: oh you New York Girls
example.text: John dances the polka whenever he gets the chance.

example.name: dance-n
example.text: these classes modify traditional aerobic dance by adding martial arts moves, step platforms, Latin rhythms, dumbbells, and other props, thereby placing the focus of the workout on different muscle groups.

example.name: dance-n: arg 0 and 2
example.text: His first dance with his new wife

example.name: dancing-n: arg 0 only
example.text: Moderate activities, such as her dancing, may be continued as able.

roleset.name: move dancingly along a path
roleset.note: DANCE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3. (from dance.02-v)
DANCE-N NOTES: Added due to expansion of nombank. VN class modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3. Framed by Katie. (from dance.02-n)

example.name: dance-v: now that's a storm
example.text: Cupboard doors were flying, the trash can in the kitchen walked a few feet, the dogs came running, and I scooted them into the dog run and stood in the doorway myself, watching the outside trash cans dance across the concrete.

example.name: dance-n
example.text: Mr. Bush 's dance across the stage

roleset.name: dance a breakdance
roleset.note: BREAKDANCE-V, BREAKDANCE-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

role.descr: explicit mention of the dance or move

example.name: breakdance-v
example.text: I've always wanted to learn how to skateboard and breakdance.

example.name: do_breakdance-l
example.text: The small cousins sang "Jingle Bells," while my cousin Stan and I did a breakdance out front.
